title: Mental Health Awareness App
description: Lead a team to develop a mental health awareness application. Used the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React-Native, NodeJS) and Expo to develop a cross-platform application. Designed an easy to navigate and expandable user interface. Prioritized user secutify by adding encryption to user data. Integrated with Tumblr API to match users with content selected by a recommendation system with TensorflowJS.

title: Battle Ship
description: Collaborated in a team to developed two version of Battle Ship. Implemented a JS/CSS/HTML version from scratch. Designed and implemented game logic. Refactored code from another team's project. Updated user interface from CLI to GUI use PyGame. Implemented computer controlled bots for single player gameplay.

title: Warehouse Scheduling
description: Worked with World Wide Technologies to develop a dispatcher for managing intake, delivery, and stock in a large warehouse. Implemented Q-learning algorithm to train dispatcher. Improved efficiency over greedy based approaches by 20%

title: IMA Math-to-Industry Boot Camp
description: A summer boot camp aimed at taking graduate students from math and training them to be data scientists. Included a crash course in stochastic methods, machine learning, R, and Python. My final project trained an agent using reinforcement learning to efficiently manage incoming orders and disptach orders in a large warehouse.
